entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
